item.title: Again -=- my portalls admin portal dont work?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:2, topic:227304”]Well, it should be >= 2 for it to be for admin and owner, and its missing brackets.
it should look something like this

case 4150: //admin portal if (playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = 2873; teleportToY = 3593; sendMessage("You teleport to the admin area."); } else { sendMessage("You have to be an admin to use this portal."); } break; [/quote]
yeah that should work, just delete that case for the portal and add that in there.

Read full topic
item.source: Again -=- my portalls admin portal dont work?

item.title: Again -=- my portalls admin portal dont work?
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

Well, it should be >= 2 for it to be for admin and owner, and its missing brackets.
it should look something like this

case 4150: //admin portal
		if (playerRights >= 2) {
			teleportToX = 2873;
                        teleportToY = 3593;
                        sendMessage("You teleport to the admin area.");
		}
		else {
			sendMessage("You have to be an admin to use this portal.");
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Again -=- my portalls admin portal dont work?
item.dc:creator: @eschwin112 eschwin112
item.description:
@eschwin112 wrote:

my portal dont teleport me.

this is my code

case 4150: //admin portal if(playerRights == 2) teleportToX = 2873; teleportToY = 3593; sendMessage("you teleport to the admin area."); if(playerRights == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a admin to use this portal"); break;

it says if i click on the portal. you teleport to the admin area. but it stands where it was. and i putted the coord to teleport to. whats wron with this ? and this is only for admin/owner

Read full topic
